lead_paragraph: UNLUCKY.--Judge Thonton, California Land Commissioner, who is now at Washington, had his left hand taken off while tinder the Influence of chloroform. Before setting out front his home In Alabama, he made Union speech, in the course of which a disunionista named Clark, a att man, like Thornton, gave him the, lie.
